deleteAccount: Sei sicuro di voler eliminare definitivamente il tuo account?
name: Nome
loginEmailSent: Ti è stata inviata un' email che ti permette di accedere
noEmailProvidedLoggingIn: L'indirizzo email non è stato verificato.
subscribeToTheClothingLoopNewsletter: Iscriviti alla newsletter The Clothing Loop
areYouALoopAdmin: Are you a Loop Admin? Enter your email below to login.
notPartOfTheClothingLoopYet: Not part of The Clothing Loop yet,
yourClosetIsAboutToBecomeAWholeLotMoreSu: Your closet is about to become a whole lot more sustainable, more fun and more YOU!
weWillReplySoon: Qualcuno del nostro team sarà presto in contatto con te
clickToSetLoopLocation: Click on the map to set the approximate location of your Loop. A dot will appear, you can manually change the radius in the field below.
clickToChangeLoopLocation: Click on the map to change the location of the Loop
ifNoSizesAreShowing: If no sizes are showing, the participant didn't select any interested size when joining.
ThereIsNoActiveLoopInYourRegion: There is no active Loop in your region... but there should be! Would you like to start one? It is easy and a lot of fun! Click below, sign in, and we will send you all the information to get you started.
clothingTypePopoverMessage: The Clothing Loop is open to all people, regardless of the gender they feel is best representing their identity. Therefore, we decided to split clothes into normative gender lines influenced by the fashion industry, and leave the choice which one to join up to you.
clothingSizesPopoverMessage: We recommend to start* with either: - A mix of items from size 36 - 42 (Small - Medium - Large). - A plus size Loop for sizes XL XXL XXXL and up if relevant. In our experience, bags with these mixed sizes ranges work very well, as sizes vary per brand, era and country anyway. *If needed, Loops can later on always be tailored to a more narrow size range.
adminSwitcherMessage: Do you want to set everything up, but are you not quite ready for launching? Just keep this slider set to invisible for a little longer! Don’t wait too long though, as someone else may beat you to the chase and start a Loop in the same area. And even though there can be multiple Loops in the same area, it may cause a bit of confusion.
migratingDutchLoops: We are in the process of migrating all Dutch Loops into this platform. If you are in the Netherlands and want to join, please sign up using the link below.
byDonatingACupOfCoffee: By donating a cup of coffee to the creators we can help you find your next sweater
thankYouForStartingThisLoop: Grazie per aver avviato questo Loop!
youAreUnlockingTheClothesSwapPotential: You are unlocking the clothes swap potential for so many people in your neighbourhood, we hope you are as excited about this as we are!
hostConfirmationEmailIsOnItsWay: Our confirmation email is on its way. Please verify before logging in.
confirmationEmailIsOnItsWay: Our confirmation email is on its way.
swapDontShopMessage: Want to dress more sustainably? Clear out your closet and surprise others with the clothes you no longer wear? Brighten up your wardrobe without spending a dime? Or simply connect with people in your neighborhood? Look no further! The Clothing Loop is an easy-to-access initiative for swapping clothes with other people in your area or neighborhood. It’s fun, it’s free, it’s sustainable!
findALoopNearYou: Trova un Loop vicino a te
joinALoopMessage: Want to join? Welcome to join us! Check out our map and sign up for a Loop near you. No active Loop for you to join in your area yet? We are happy to help you set one up! Joining is free and open to everyone.
getReadyToSwapMessage: The host of your local Loop will add you to the route as soon as possible. After that, it is only a matter of time before the first bag will arrive! If you find something you like, you can take it out of the bag. And you put in something that no longer suits you, before passing the bag on to the next person on the list. Don’t forget to share a picture of your newfound favorite with the group!
fromLocalLockdownToSuccess: From local lockdown initiative to international success
fromLocalLockdownToSuccessMessage: The Clothing Loop originated in Amsterdam. Within one year, this local initiative became the powerful movement it is today; together we saved mountains of clothes, our neighbors got to know each other, and we brought about a real change in behavior with regard to textile consumption.
readMoreAboutUs: Leggi di più su di noi
smallActsCanChangeTheWorld: "Small acts, when multiplied by millions of people, can change the world" Howard Zinn
weAreWorkingOnMakingTheClothingLoopBette: We are constantly working to make The Clothing Loop better, more widespread and more impactful. Click here if you want to help us do so!
currentlyWeAreDevelopingOurPlatform: Currently we are developing our platform as best as we can. Right now we have the website up and running on your desktop and soon it will be available for mobile. Hang in there
troublesWithTheSignupContactUs: Troubles with the signup? Contact us
upToYouUsuallyTheGeopraphic: Up to you, usually the geographic location of your Loop works best as a Loop name, keep it short and sweet! You can elaborate in the description box below.
decideOnTheAreaYourLoopWillBeActiveIn: Decide on the area your Loop will be active in. The dot in the map will change size according to your radius. We recommend a smaller radius for densely populated areas, and a larger one for villages and rural areas.
optionalFieldTypeAnything: Optional field, type anything else you want to add that makes your Loop unique. This can always be edited at a later stage!
mixedBagsUsuallyWorkBestThereforeWeRecom: Mixed bags usually work best, therefore we recommend to either tick all three boxes (X)S- M-(X)L for a mixed Loop, or to start a separate Loop for plus sizes.
iAmNotAMinor<1>Tos</1>And<2>PrivacyPolic: I am not a minor and accept and agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1> and <2>Privacy Policy</2>*
thankYouForBeingHere: Thank you for being here, together we are making the world a more sustainable place, one Loop at a time!
goToTheToolkitFolder: Go to the Toolkit Folder, which includes our Manual, Impact Report and more.
youAretheSpecialTypeOfPersonThatLiftsPeo: You are the special type of person that lifts people up, and makes the world a better place. Rest assured that every donation has us doing a little dance in our (home) office. We've got a lot of work ahead of us, and your donation has made it that much easier to get things done and thrust us forward towards a more sustainable world. Thank you so much for your desire to help The Clothing Loop succeed.
byDonatingYouAgreeWithOur: By donating you agree with our
dontHaveACreditCardChooseSepa: Don't have a credit card? Choose 'SEPA Direct Debit' in the next step.
thanksForConsideringADonation:
Thank you for considering a donation to The Clothing Loop!
With your donation we will continue to work effortlessly to make The Clothing Loop even better, bigger and more impactful.
iWillSupportTheClothingLoopWithAMonthlyD: Sosterrò The Clothing Loop con una donazione mensile:
iWillSupportTheClothingLoopWithAOneTimeD: Sosterrò The Clothing Loop con una donazione unica:
howDoYouWantToContributeToTheClothingLoo: Come vorresti contribuire a The Clothing Loop?

yourDonationAmountMustBePositive: Your donation amount must be positive
youMustSpecifyANumberAsDonation: You must specify a number as donation amount
youAreNowSubscribedToOurMonthlyNewslette: You are now subscribed to our monthly newsletter!
keepUpWithOurLatestNews: Stay tuned for our latest news
subscribeToRecieveOurLatestNews: Sign up and receive our latest news, tips and inspiration, and data on the impact of swapping in your inbox monthly!
pleaseSetTheLoopLocationByClick: Please set the Loop location by clicking the map
startingALoopIsFunAndEasy: Starting a Loop is fun and easy!
inOurManualYoullFindAllTheStepsNewSwapEm: In our manual you'll find all the steps to make your new swap empire run smoothly. Three more things to do:
firstRegisterYourLoopViaThisForm: 1. register your Loop using this form.
secondLoginViaLink: 2. log in using the link sent to you by email.
thirdSendFriendsToWebsite: 3. send friends and neighbors to this website to sign up, and wait for the sign-ups to pour in!
allDataOfNewParticipantsCanBeAccessed: All information about new participants can be accessed on your personal page.
areYouAlreadyHosting<a>JoinAnExistingLoo:
Are you already hosting a Loop? Log in here to access the people who have signed up for your Loop. They are eager to join!
Would you like to join as a participant and not start your own Loop? Sure you can.
weWouldLikeToKnowThisEquallyRepresented: We would like to know this, to see if different size interests are equally represented within your Loop. Also, knowing this makes it easier to split the route over time, depending on size interest!
